snippet: Jets safety Eric Smith could miss the rest of the preseason after spraining a ligament in his left knee while covering a punt during the team’s 17-6 loss to Cincinnati on Friday night.
abstract: New York Jets safety Eric Smith could miss the rest of the preseason after spraining a ligament in his left knee while covering a punt during preseason opener; other football items noted.
lead_paragraph: Jets safety Eric Smith could miss the rest of the preseason after spraining a ligament in his left knee while covering a punt during the team’s 17-6 loss to Cincinnati on Friday night.

headline.seo: Knee Injury Sidelines Jets Safety Eric Smith
